mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.title AS "title", a.description AS "description", a.type AS "type", a.tags AS "tags", b.name AS "broker.name", a.broker_id AS "broker.id", a.keywords AS "keywords", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
left join mod_broker b on b.id=a.broker_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mod_board( id, broker_id, title, description, type, tags, keywords, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{broker.id}, #{title}, #{description}, #{type}, #{tags}, #{keywords}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mod_board SET broker_id = #{broker.id}, title = #{title}, description = #{description}, type = #{type}, tags = #{tags}, keywords = #{keywords}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
